meanings.definition: To associate as a fellow or member.
meanings.sent1: We fellowshipped with our neighbors at the community picnic.
meanings.sent2: She fellowshipped with her classmates during lunch break.
meanings.sent3: The cat fellowshipped with the dog in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The flowers fellowshipped with the bees in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The children fellowshipped with the elderly at the nursing home.

meanings.definition: To participate in fellowship or social activities with others.
meanings.sent1: They fellowshipped at the church potluck every Sunday.
meanings.sent2: He fellowshipped with his colleagues at the company retreat.
meanings.sent3: The birds fellowshipped at the bird feeder in the park.
meanings.sent4: The stars fellowshipped in the night sky, shining brightly together.
meanings.sent5: The students fellowshipped at the school dance, enjoying each other's company.
